data.text: Let the beauty of Hawai‘i inspire you with roundtrip flights to Hawai‘i starting at $318. 🌺 Book today: https://t.co/4KyBn9kpND https://t.co/NQ69E8rnqU

In case you didn't know, apple bananas are in season year-round in Hawaiʻi and are mildly sweet and slightly tangy 😋. Learn more about Hawaii's exotic fruits (like breadfruit, noni and mountain apples!) here: https://t.co/DCDk5peeHv https://t.co/ZnPcWNbDwi

data.text:
It's not uncommon to find some naiʻa (dolphins) 🐬 swimming off the coast of Hawaiʻi! 

Important tip: remember to stay at least 150 feet away from all sea life.
📷 @joshmunoz https://t.co/A4m4cD7UO0

Fins up for the weekend 🐋. Did you know Humpback whales visit the Islands every year from November to May?
📷 @bkphotogallery https://t.co/s6YNwOOB6J

Find the ALOHA in the little things 😌 
Happy #AlohaFriday https://t.co/bPPkZ3Re5o

Wishing you a happy #AlohaFriday! 
📷 @balancedlifealoha https://t.co/oGgT9JCDZ2

It's not uncommon to find some nai‘a (dolphins) 🐬 swimming off the coast of Hawai‘i. Remember to stay at least 150 feet away from all sea life.
📷 @joshmunoz https://t.co/eL5Rtn8Msv

Sometimes you just need to get away from all the city lights and get lost in the stars 🌌
📷 @billydekom https://t.co/rdOGWuvos6
We're sending holiday greetings and our warmest aloha to you and your ʻohana. 💜 Mele Kalikimaka a Hauʻoli Makahiki Hou (#MerryChristmas and Happy New Year)! https://t.co/w5u80NHmyx

📍 Kaua‘i https://t.co/axM1PXuLNV

Last week, we participated in the opening ceremony as the official airline sponsor of the Eddie Aikau Big Wave Invitational. Known as the "super bowl of surfing," this event takes place at Waimea Bay on Oʻahu and honors the legacy of the late Eddie Aikau. 
https://t.co/BxlTcz8N6r https://t.co/Orwsnaj7is

📷 @360wizard https://t.co/Dt2Sz2St3x

Poke is one of the most popular dishes you'll find in Hawai‘i. Visit any poke counter today and you’ll find not just ‘ahi limu (seaweed) and spicy ‘ahi poke, but kimchee shrimp, furikake salmon and much more. What is your favorite poke flavor? https://t.co/w34yTQmbnl. https://t.co/6zldB0BpyP
